Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-21521 affecting package mysql for versions less than 8.0.40-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-21521 affecting package mysql for versions less than 8.0.40-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package mysql is earlier than 8.0.40-1, affected by CVE-2025-21521
